summary: Completed comprehensive testing of crypto investment platform. Backend APIs working with minor validation issue. Frontend landing page fully functional. Critical JavaScript bug found on market page preventing proper loading.

minor_bugs.issue: Invalid email validation not working - accepts invalid emails
minor_bugs.impact: Allows invalid emails to be stored in database
minor_bugs.details: Expected 422 for invalid email 'invalid-email' but got 200 with success response

critical_bugs.issue: JavaScript runtime error: 'data.filter is not a function'
critical_bugs.impact: Market page completely broken - shows error screen instead of crypto data
critical_bugs.details: TypeError occurs when trying to call .filter() on data that's not an array. Affects MiniSparkline component and other data processing functions.
critical_bugs.error_stack: TypeError: data.filter is not a function at MiniSparkline, Object.react_stack_bottom_frame, renderWithHooks, beginWork, runWithFiberInDEV, performUnitOfWork, workLoopSync, renderRootSync, performWorkOnRoot

passed_tests: Backend crypto/top-coins endpoint (with and without limit)
Backend newsletter/subscribe endpoint (valid and duplicate emails)
Frontend navbar components (logo, nav links, CTA button)
Frontend FAQ section with accordion functionality

action_item_for_main_agent.critical: Fix JavaScript error on market page - 'data.filter is not a function' in MiniSparkline component. Check API response format and ensure data is properly structured as arrays.
action_item_for_main_agent.medium: Add proper email validation to newsletter subscription endpoint to prevent invalid emails
action_item_for_main_agent.low: Verify all market page components load correctly after fixing the JavaScript error
